column1: Dino is at a big party with his friends. Dino wants to share a big, thin cake with his friends. The cake is on a high table. Dino thinks the cake is on the high table. A big balloon pops and makes a loud noise. Dino takes the cake from the table to share with his friends.

Caden is in his new house. Caden wants to fix all the things that are not right. There is a big leak in the roof. Caden thinks there is a big leak in the roof. A bird lands on the roof. Caden plans to call a man to fix the leak.

Vivi is in her room playing with her toys. Vivi wants to lay her small, patient triangle toy on the shelf with her other toys. The triangle toy is in her toy box. Vivi believes the triangle toy is in her toy box. A bird flies into the room through the open window. Vivi lays the triangle toy on the shelf.
Ira is in her big room. Ira wants to draw on her weird desk. The desk is very clean. Ira believes the desk is very clean. A bird flies in through the window. Ira gets her pens to draw on the desk.

Wally is sitting in his room after a long day. Wally wants to draw a calm picture with his pastels. The pastels are in a big box. Wally thinks the pastels are in the big box. The room starts to glow with a soft light from the setting sun. Wally opens the box to take out the pastels.

Remy is in the woods by the river. Remy wants to build a boat with a big, shy log. The log is very heavy. Remy thinks the log is very heavy. A bird sings a beautiful song. Remy tries to lift the log to start building the boat.

Jack is in the kitchen in his house. Jack wants a cold drink from the refrigerator. The refrigerator is full of fresh food. Jack thinks the refrigerator is full of fresh food. A bird flies into the kitchen through the open window. Jack opens the refrigerator to get a cold drink.

Polly is in a busy room cleaning up. Polly wants to make the room clean with her new mop. The mop is in the corner of the room. Polly thinks the mop is in the corner of the room. A bird flies into the room through the open window. Polly gets the mop from the corner to clean the room.

Uma is in a room full of toys. Uma wants to find an easy pin to play with. The pin is in the big toy box. Uma thinks the pin is in the big toy box. The lights in the room turn off and then on again. Uma digs in the toy box to find the pin.

Olivia is in a field full of giant flowers. Olivia wants to find the most beautiful giant flower to take a picture of it. There is a persistent bee buzzing around one of the giant flowers. Olivia believes that the persistent bee is buzzing around the giant flower. A bird flies over and lands on a nearby tree. Olivia waits for the bee to leave so she can examine the flower.
